title: Number of committed crimes , by type U.S. 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Type of crime, and Number of committed crimes in each Type of crime on the y axis.
The Number of committed crimes is highest at Type of crime Property crime  (total) and lowest at Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.
The Number of committed crimes of Type of crime Property crime  (total) is 443.82% larger than the minimum value at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Type of crime in the x axis and Number of committed crimes in the y axis.
Type of crime Property crime  (total) has the highest Number of committed crimes and Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter has the lowest Number of committed crimes.
The highest value at Type of crime Property crime  (total) is 443.82x times more than the lowest value at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter.

Type of crime Property crime  (total) is higher than any other Type of crimes with value 7196045.0, followed by Larceny-theft, and Burglary. Down to Type of crime Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter with the lowest value 16214.0.
The lowest value 16214.0 at Murder and nonnegligent manslaughter is almost 3.84 times smaller than the average value 1871554.56.
The Number of committed crimes is 16843991.0 if we add up values of all Type of crimes.
